name: Strong Moon
description:
Strong Moon is an action and adventure hard-as-hell videogame inspired in the 90's cartoons, in which you’ll accompany our mighty, incredible and bald protagonist —Strong Moon— on his quest to find his weird brother, who was kidnapped by a deranged magician who wants at all costs the power of Strong Moon’s brother to be the one who rules everything… a very cartoonish plot, don’t you think so? Explore Lunaria's planet and become stronger with new allies help, Moon Essence and our star's mighty muscles... or rather, moon?

Features


Is Strong Moon of the platform genre? Or adventure? Or maybe metroidvania? The reality is that it has a bit of all of them.

-Traditional animation and graphics inspired by the 90's cartoons
Strong Moon has animations done in the traditional way and a graphic style inspired by the cartoons and flash animations of the 90's.

-Inexistent loading times once your game has started
Like us, do you hate loading times every time you die in a video game? Well, we have excellent news for you; in Strong Moon there are no loading times when dying, the game restarts instantly. The only loading screen you will see will be the first time you enter your game.


-Unlock 4 abilities
Defeat the guardians of each area and get a new ability like the dash, double jump, Super dash or an energy fist.

-Increase your strength and medical kits
Increase the strength of Strong Moon with Mr. Lolo and your medical kits with Helena (4 bandages required) using Moon Essence obtained from defeating your enemies.

-Moon Shards
Find the Moon Fragments that are scattered throughout Lunaria, by getting 3 of them the maximum life of Strong moon will increase.

-Open world
You have complete freedom of exploration from the beginning; Do you want to go to the desert first? Or… maybe you prefer to go to the Krakamoon volcano? The decision is yours.

-Bestiary
If you want to know more about your enemies you can check the entries in your bestiary, there you will be able to know the health and experience of each of your opponents as well as Strong Moon's peculiar opinion about them.


-Travel journals
If you are interested in knowing more about the Lunaria's history, you can search and collect diaries of travelers who perished on their journey.

- Memorable bosses
All the bosses of Strong Moon represent a great challenge and each one has a different combat style, can you beat them?


-Full support for Xbox One controller
Strong Moon is fully compatible with Xbox One controllers, with vibration features for a more immersive experience.

-Soundtrack
Strong Moon's soundtrack is unique, as well as having excellent quality.

-Hard as hell
Strong Moon has a VERY HIGH DIFFICULTY like the classic games of the 90's, will you be able to meet the challenge and get all 18 achievements available? Try it!
